",["$r","p",null,{"children":"从头开始一键安装 GNU Radio 在 Thinkpad X230 上实测大约只需要 40 分钟，下载非常快，主要的时间就剩编译了。而且安装的都是最新的版本。"}],"

",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}pip3 install pybombs
rm -rf ~/.pybombs
pybombs recipes add gr-recipes git+https://{{mirror}}/recipes/gr-recipes.git
pybombs recipes add gr-etcetera git+https://{{mirror}}/recipes/gr-etcetera.git
mkdir gnuradio-prefix
cd gnuradio-prefix
pybombs prefix init
pybombs install gnuradio
. ./setup_env.sh
gnuradio-companion
